Millie Bobby Brown is following in the footsteps of fellow former child stars Jodie Foster, Brooke Shields and Emma Watson by going to college at the height of her fame.

articles.title: Blackpink, Lizzo, Jack Harlow, Maneskin to Perform at 2022 MTV VMAs - Variety
articles.description: Popular on Variety Blackpink, Jack Harlow, Lizzo and Måneskin are the latest round of performers announced for MTV’s VMAs, airing live from Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey on Sunday, August 28th at 8 p.m. ET/PT. They join previously announced performe…
